text: Giorgio Sonnino (17 February 1844 - 29 November 1921) was a senator of the Kingdom of Italy. He was born at Alexandria, Egypt, and died in Rome. He was a Jew, but converted to Anglicanism, the faith of his Welsh wife. Category:Italian Anglicans Category:Converts to Anglicanism from Judaism Category:Jewish Italian politicians Category:Italian politicians Category:People of Egyptian-Jewish descent Category:1844 births Category:1921 deaths
title: Giorgio Sonnino
